entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
